general_info.name: HANGAR
general_info.creator: Imco van Gent
general_info.description: HANGAR: Tool that loads an existing CPACS file which has been initiated by a design initialization software.

execution_info.description: The mode in which the wing of the AGILE DC1 aircraft is initialized for TUD wing analysis.
The mode in which the full AGILE DC1 aircraft at fidelity level L0 is initialized.
The mode in which the wing of the AGILE DC1 aircraft at fidelity level L0 is initialized.
Mode in which the ATR72 aircraft model is loaded from the AGILE hangar.
Mode in which the boxwing aircraft model is loaded from the AGILE hangar.
Mode in which the D150 aircraft model is loaded from the AGILE hangar.
Mode in which the NASA Common Research Model aircraft model is loaded from the AGILE hangar.
